content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. As the landlord, I am looking to maximize my profits, so I am willing to discuss the rental price with you. Can you provide me with an offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can offer 1500 Euros per month."

content: Thank you for your offer, Hassan. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 1500 Euros per month, I am looking for a higher rental price. Can you consider increasing your offer?

I can offer 1800 Euros per month."
